section.name: Development Tooling Tutorial
section.p: Also know as adding a little magic to your development toolkit.

tr.td: Instructions for triggering the automatic magic install.
A walk through of setting up an index, creating a couple of projects, adding some content, adding a reactor build, followed by a review of the process and the generated project resources.
Addition of a testcase to our 'system' project and demonstration of the automatic compilation and test execution provided by Magic.
A quick introduction to source filtering including the use of Magic's filter task and the demonstration of how project model information can be easily extracted and used in your build process.
This tutorial takes us through the process of module creation and and includes an summary of the generated module and it's potential application when publishing content.
